author: Special Correspondent
text:
Amid reports of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) chief, Mohan Bhagwat, having demanded the setting up of a committee for deciding the eligibility for reservation, the RSS on Monday denied any such statements by him.

The Janata Dal (United) issued a strong statement condemning “the repeated efforts” by Mr. Bhagwat “to abolish the ongoing reservation policy granted to the socially and educationally backward.” However, an RSS press statement said: “Bhagwatji did not make any such comment…The RSS never recognises any discrimination on the basis of language, province, creed and caste.”
title: ‘We do not recognise any discrimination’
